website_summaries.verdict: Scientifically formulated to target oil sources and control them versus overpower their activity.
pros: With its focus on helping balance oil production, this cleanser is ideal for anyone with oily skin, no matter your skin's condition
Customers love that their skin feeling and looking healthy after cleansing
cons: It helps cleanse pores but does not necessarily help fight major breakouts

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old and have suffered with acne off and on all my life. I have tried every product on the market from the drug store brand to the prescription products and nothing has ever controlled my acne before I found this amazing product. I had a huge problem with clogged pores this completely did away with that issue. Do not hesitate to try this product you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey G.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a fake!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before and was disappointed at the completely different scent which is rather strong. Little did I know this was not the same product as the authentic product that I purchased from Ulta. Not only is it different but it broke me out in large red dry patches that are hot to the touch and uncomfortable. As I mentioned I have used this face cleanser for quite sometime before buying online. My only thought is that this is a fake which is disappointing. Sadly I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Officially my new daily face wash
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin with adult acne and needed to upgrade my skincare. I tried a few different washes, and this one is by far my favorite. It doesn't take much to smoothly cover my face. It cleanses well but doesn't feel harsh. The scent and slightest tingly feeling remind me of menthol, but it's just fresh rather than overpowering. Soothes my skin rather than irritating it. I've noticed a bit of improvement in the acne too. It can be a *little bit* drying sometimes on its own, but the Sebium Lotion (more like a moisturizing toner than a lotion?) fixes that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Nevil

customer_reviews.title: Acne free skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive and delicate skin. This worked better than expected. My face has been pretty much Acne free ever since I started using it. I might get one or two breakouts during that time of the month, but for the most part my face is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Meg-meglio

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin savior
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my face wayyyyyyy less oily than any other face wash I have ever used! Very gentle and doesn’t dry your skin out but really cleanses the extra oil away. My skin isn’t completely oil free by any means but this cuts down my grease problem by at least 60%. If you also battle an oil slick forehead I would definetly give this a try and it’s not terribly expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa roop

customer_reviews.title: like cleaning with a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: a very thorough,gentle cleanser. does not strip your skin, no tight feeling after cleaning and no redness or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid soap not foaming gel.
customer_reviews.text: This pumps out watered down liquid soap. Takes a couple of handfuls just to wash face. Its not foaming gel at all. Watery liquid soap.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Scratchley

customer_reviews.title: Regimen works!
customer_reviews.text: Learned about this product by watching you Tube olena beley of pop the pimple (amazing amazing tips that have saved my crazy onset of adult acne!). This product was mentioned along with other ones from Bioderma. However listening to you tube videos really made sense for me. I’m a pharmacist and have seen all the different medications out there and understood the etiology to acne. However olena put it all together in a simple yet scientific to the point understanding. Bioderma helped me get back to clear skin (was battling this onset of acne for about 1 year trying many natural remedies to some different lines of skin care on the market) .
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clean oily skin well
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed with this product. It’s a nice enough foaming gel cleanser but it doesn’t seem to clean the face well. I always feel a little bit greasy even after I wash my face with this. There is a lot of product so it’s a good value, but the wash is just mediocre. It also smells slightly like mens cologne, or a masculine scent.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser for oily skin. Was prescribed by my dermatologist. Used it for years. Tried other brands . Went back to this. Will help with pimples not to break out. Very good and mild face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bottle arrived broken as I show you in the picture and because of that it lost liquid. That is not make me really happy because the product is not that cheap. About the product itself i am starting to use it today and the first time I used it I feel my skin very clean. It is easy to use and do not have so much scent, so for me is good. I will continue used it to clean my face day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Yanitza Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: First step in fighting oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further if you struggle with oily or combination and acne prone skin. This cleanser has everything going for it. It’s gentle. It’s light. It leaves my skin feeling so clean and so refreshed and so soft. I don’t struggle with oily skin like I used to. I used to walk out the door for the day and already be an oily mess but this cleanser changed that. This was my first step to bettering my skin and it’s become my number one tool at fighting oily skin. I’m on my second order I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Perry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this with pore reducer, mat lotion for day and hydra lotion for night. My skin has NEVER looked this good. I noticed results within 2 days. I'm 4 days in and my skin looks and feels sooooooo much better
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed by this face wash. Honestly, I could just get something from the drugstore to wash my face. It doesn't really lather and I haven't noticed any difference in the oil on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brunson

customer_reviews.title: I've tried pretty much everything in the past
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product when I forgot my face wash and ended up in a pharmacy at midnight in Vancouver. My skin seems to break out and be very temperamental when it comes to products. This facial wash really evened out my skin, and I can't remember the last time I had a breakout. I've tried pretty much everything in the past, from prescription face wash, to high end products, and nothing worked as well as this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Great facewash for oily/acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this facewash. I first bought it in France (my skin type is oily/breakout prone) and It helped my skin a lot. This is the same the same exact product I bought in France it’s not a “fake.” Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke D.

customer_reviews.title: The best product in market:)
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for more than 20 years now and always buy the big size.This is a great product with high quality.It’s one of the main reasons of me having a nice healthy skin.just wish they had some kind of promotions or discounts as pharmacies!
customer_reviews.author: Wayland wagner

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleaner ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My face is having a field day with this cleanser, it has managed to control my combined skin and oil in my T zone. I just wash my face twice a day with this cleanser and it has been enough in three weeks to more less control my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Susy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin smooth
customer_reviews.text: Tried many different products and when I got up in the morning my face was peeling, blotchy and red. This product is not only inexpensive, it cleans my skin, leaves it soft, smooth and looks great the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for combo/dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My new fave facial wash! And it smells soooooo good! I feel fresh when I use it
customer_reviews.author: Tanaye White

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this face wash. It just gives the right balance to my skin and cleans well. I have a combination skin and it does a great job at keeping the balance between not too oily and dry. Im definitely gonna order again!
customer_reviews.author: Sneha Awasthi

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin less dry but doesn’t help with acne
customer_reviews.text: This product honestly didn’t live up to the hype I saw in the reviews. My face was still breaking out a lot too and the product produces more oil in your skin so don’t use especially it you already have really oily skin. I thought it would be fine because I had dry skin because I know that you need a little bit of oil production to protect your skin barrier but this product was just not it. It does help with dry skin but that’s it. I used their moisturizer too. Their moisturizer is great but just not this.
customer_reviews.author: Lumene

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, makes my skin baby soft!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells absolutely delightful! It's a lovely light cucumber-ey sent that is so "spa-like"! I use it every morning in the shower and my skin is left feeling baby soft. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cleanser for acne
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser for acne. Although it says oil skin and normal if you have dry skin is still gentle with you. It is just great!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive oily/combo
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive oily/combo skin and this cleanser has become my holy grail. Very gentle and absolutely effective. This heals existing breakouts with one cleanse (even hormonal) and keeps new breakouts away better than anything else I've ever used. I had been using Bioderma micellar water (also recommend) for a couple years and decided to try this because I liked the micellar water so much. Very glad I did, it has saved my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for oily face
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything and anything out there. I have used La Roche Posay Effaclar for years, and I decided to give this a try and I am very glad I did! It's the best facial cleaner I've bought before. It leaves the skin refreshed, without drying it out completely. I have extreme oily face and my face produces sebum out of nowhere. I am a mixed latina with dark complexion and very little acne. I get a pimple once a month or so. This cleaner is my new favourite!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: good facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love Bioderma products and I got this gel to use after Bioderma facial cleanser water, its smell is not the best smell but its bearable, it is quiet effective for cleaning up the face at the end of day n getting rid of all the germs and makeup residues on your face and feeling fresh after
customer_reviews.author: Ziba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is thorough so it alone without other sebium products is enough for me. It leaves my skin clean and soft. I use a full pump each time I wash to get a thick foam as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t dry your face, And very very gentle
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, i buy it all the time for more than 10 years it’s so gentle on the skin and it transformed my skin, I always recommend it to everybody I know and I see, specially the ones that complements my skin I tell them it’s my secret to healthy skin.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser is ok - pumping mechanism rusted
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward cleanser. Has a thinner consistency and performs fine as a basic cleanser. However,I believe something rusted in the pumping mechanism of the bottle and deposited some rust into the product itself. For the price point of the product, I expect better packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: We heard great reviews about this product but unfortunately my daughter has super sensitive skin and had a break out after using it one time so we had to return it. The other products purchased have been great!

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: This strips my skin a little bit. Foams up very well. Scent could be a little less. The big bottle should last me many months.

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner i have an oily sometimes dry dehydrated acne prone skin. This cleanser is gentle yet gets the job done leaving my skin feeling clean. Not too harsh so it doesn’t cause dryness.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.text: Bioderma facial wash is one of my favourites, it doesn’t irritate my skin and keeps my face clean and grease-free. I’ve been using this bottle for more than 2 months and still have a good amount left in it, would definitely buy again

customer_reviews.text: This face wash has done a great job keeping oil at bay and clearing up hormone-related acne. I will buy again, for sure!

Now i have to purchase a empty bottle to put in , the product, buy this product again but only in a store where i can test the nozzle.

customer_reviews.text: I love how it deep cleanses and makes my skin feel after rinsing. It even washes away my mascara pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

product_meta.title: Bioderma Sebium Foaming Gel Facial Cleanser for Combination to Oily Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:3.33 Fl OzSpecially designed for combination to oily skin, our Sébium Foaming Gel gently cleanse and purify your skin without drying it out. Sébium Foaming Gel contains our patented D.A.F complex that contributes to improve the tolerance threshold of your skin.

BRAND STORY
BIODERMA has acquired unique expertise by placing biology at the service of dermatology. This original scientific approach relies first and foremost on the skin's knowledge and its biological mechanisms to formulate its products.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
